Input.name: Scan Strategy
Input.desc: Which scan strategy you'd like to be used on the part.

Input.name: Part File Name
Input.desc: The file name of the part (which must be in the `geometry` folder; do not prefix it with `geometry`).

Hatching.name: Hatch Angle
Hatching.desc: The angle to rotate per layer.

Hatching.name: Volume of Offset Hatch
Hatching.desc: Offset between internal and external boundary (Need to confirm what this actually does).

Hatching.name: Spot Compensation
Hatching.desc: Additional, multiplicative offset to account for laser spot size. Set to 1 for no change.

Hatching.name: # Inner Contours
Hatching.desc: Number of inner contours. (Need to confirm difference between inner and outer contours)

Hatching.name: # Outer Contours
Hatching.desc: Number of outer contours. (Need to confirm difference between inner and outer contours)

Hatching.name: Hatch Sorting Method
Hatching.desc: Which way you'd like to sort the hatches.

Debug.name: Write Debug Info
Debug.desc: Whether to write program debug information to the debug.txt file.

Trajectory Ordering.name: Contour First
Trajectory Ordering.desc: Whether to print contours before hatches each layer.
